channel.title: How can i get my stars up on forums?
channel.description:
how can i get my stars up on forums....?im so confused :confused: my friend said i need to ask questions in the question part and help answer pplz questions...lol i've done this for sooo long i just wanna get my reep up to at least senior member lol ........plox help
---d-dizzle

item.description:

wow thank you I was wondering about that myself

item.title: How can i get my stars up on forums?
item.dc:creator: @jehanne jehanne
item.description:
@jehanne wrote:

you posted 23 times. and posts in advertisement sectyion dont count.

has to do quiz = 1 star
0-50 posts = junior member = 2 stars
50-100 posts = member = 3 stars
100+ posts = senior member = 4 stars

after 50 rep tell a mod then u get cm stat = 5 stars

Read full topic
item.source: How can i get my stars up on forums?
